languages.text: If a noble uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on their servant, the servant gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack with itself.
languages.original_text: Если аристократ применяет {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} к слуге, слуга получает +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} в следующем {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ходу{/g}. При повторном применении эффект не суммируется.

traits.locale_text: If the noble affected used an ability on the servant, the servant gains +1 AP next turn. Does not stack with itself.
If the noble affected used an ability on the servant, the servant gains +1 AP next turn. Does not stack with itself.
If a noble uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on their servant, the servant gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack with itself.
If a noble uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on their servant, the servant gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack with itself.

languages.text: Wenn ein Adliger eine {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}Fähigkeit{/g} auf den Diener angewendet hat, erhält der Diener im nächsten {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}Zug{/g} +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}. Stapelt nicht mit sich selbst.
languages.original_text: If a noble uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on their servant, the servant gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack with itself.

traits.locale_text: Wenn der betroffene Adlige eine Fähigkeit auf den Diener angewendet hat, erhält der Diener im nächsten Zug +1 AP. Kann nicht aufaddiert werden.

languages.text: Si le noble affecté a utilisé une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} sur le serviteur, ce dernier bénéficie de +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} au {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. Bonus non cumulable avec lui-même.
languages.original_text: If a noble uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on their servant, the servant gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack with itself.

traits.locale_text: Si le noble affecté a utilisé une {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacité{/g} sur le serviteur, ce dernier bénéficie de +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} au {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}tour{/g} suivant. Bonus non cumulable avec lui-même.

languages.text: 如果受影响的贵族对仆佣使用了{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}能力{/g}，则仆佣在下个{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}回合{/g}额外获得1点{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}行动点数{/g}。此效果无法多次叠加。
languages.original_text: If a noble uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on their servant, the servant gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack with itself.

traits.locale_text: 如果受影响的贵族对仆佣使用了能力，则仆佣在下个回合额外获得1点行动点数。此效果无法多次叠加。

languages.text: Si el noble ha usado una {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}capacidad{/g} sobre su sirviente, el sirviente gana +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}PA{/g} el próximo {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turno{/g}. Este efecto no se acumula consigo mismo.
languages.original_text: If a noble uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on their servant, the servant gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack with itself.

traits.locale_text: Si el noble ha usado una capacidad sobre su sirviente, el sirviente gana +1 PA el próximo turno. Este efecto no es acumulativo.

languages.text: 貴族が従者に{g|Encyclopedia:Ability}アビリティ{/g}を使用すると、その従者は次の{g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ターン{/g}に{g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g}が+1される。この効果は累積しない。
languages.original_text: If a noble uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on their servant, the servant gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack with itself.

traits.locale_text: 貴族が従者の使用したアビリティの効果を受けた時、その従者は次のターンにAPが+1される。この効果は累積しない。

languages.text: Если аристократ применяет {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}способность{/g} к слуге, слуга получает +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}ОД{/g} в следующем {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}ходу{/g}. При повторном применении эффект не суммируется.
languages.original_text: If a noble uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on their servant, the servant gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack with itself.

traits.locale_text: Если аристократ использует способность на слугу, слуга получает +1 ОД в следующем ходу. При повторном применении эффект не суммируется.
Если аристократ использует способность на слугу, слуга получает +1 ОД в следующем ходу. При повторном применении эффект не суммируется.

languages.text: Bir soylu, hizmetkârı üzerinde bir {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}kabiliyet{/g} kullanırsa hizmetkâr bir sonraki {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turda{/g} +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}EP{/g} kazanır. Etki üst üste birikmez.
languages.original_text: If a noble uses an {g|Encyclopedia:Ability}ability{/g} on their servant, the servant gains +1 {g|Encyclopedia:ActionPoints}AP{/g} next {g|Encyclopedia:Turn}turn{/g}. Does not stack with itself.
